channel.title: [PI] Thread 4 error
channel.description:
Recently, I was trying to 633 items to my client with this tutorial - [url=http://tinyurl.com/3nwpgnx]http://tinyurl.com/3nwpgnx[/url]
I had 1 error but I fixed that, now when I log in, I can see the gameframe and all but then the client freezes and show this error:
[code]Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at ObjectDef.readValues(ObjectDef.java:373) at ObjectDef.forID(ObjectDef.java:23) at ObjectManager.method189(ObjectManager.java:1317) at client.method54(client.java:2773) at client.loadingStages(client.java:2742) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3175) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2340) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4650) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
[url=http://pastebin.com/teMkkEp7]http://pastebin.com/teMkkEp7[/url] - Client.java
[url=http://pastebin.com/A7U9gBws]http://pastebin.com/A7U9gBws[/url] - ObjectDef.java
[url=http://pastebin.com/M8ftf0Qf]http://pastebin.com/M8ftf0Qf[/url] - ObjectManager.java
[url=http://pastebin.com/z4qXJhEE]http://pastebin.com/z4qXJhEE[/url] - RSApplect.java
Thanks ahead of time ^^
If you need any other info, just let me know

item.title: [PI] Thread 4 error
item.dc:creator: @GerraOnline GerraOnline
item.description:
@GerraOnline wrote:

It’s a packet sent from the server that crashes cheats clients if I’m not mistaken.

Now I can navigate through the skills, options, and all that and i can type but the screen stays at loading please wait and when I hover over a spell, it doesn’t give the info and stuff

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Thread 4 error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

T1 is actually a client error. It means “Unknown Packet Type”. It’s in this format.

T1 - , , ,

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Thread 4 error
item.dc:creator: @GerraOnline GerraOnline
item.description:
@GerraOnline wrote:

Now we are getting somewhere

That got rid of the thread 4 error but I still have the ‘Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36’ but I’m presuming that that’s a server error, not client

I would rep++ but I see that you are set ^^

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Thread 4 error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

This maybe a quick fix (or it might not work)… It’s worth a try though.

Change;

actions = new String[5];

to

actions = new String[10];

Read full topic

Recently, I was trying to 633 items to my client with this tutorial - http://tinyurl.com/3nwpgnx
